parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[false]] if rope length changing animation is in progress. Returns [[true]] if animation is done.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeUnwound]] rope

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - given rope object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if unwinding is complete
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] { [[ropeUnwound]] ([[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0) };
[[hint]] "Unwinding Complete";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
